message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe will be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $9,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal. While $8,000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped, I'm willing to come down a bit. I'll accept $8,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know if you're interested in closing this deal.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $8,250. This is the highest I can go. What do you think?
